mapper.select: SELECT A.CLOUMN_ID AS columnId, A.XPATH AS path, A.FIELD_ID AS fieldId, B.TABLE_ID AS tableId, B.COLUMN_NAME AS columnName FROM P_DOC_MAPPING A LEFT JOIN P_FIELD_COLUMN_CONF B ON A.CLOUMN_ID = B.ID_ AND B.IS_DELETED = 0 WHERE A.DOC_ID = #{id} AND A.XPATH LIKE '/ClinicalDocument/structuredBody%' AND A.IS_FEILD = '1' ORDER BY B.TABLE_ID

SELECT D.COLUMN_NAME AS colmn, D.TABLE_ID AS tableId, E.COLUMN_NAME AS col, E.TABLE_ID AS tId, C.CLOUMN_ID AS colId, A.CLOUMN_ID AS columnId FROM P_DOC_MAPPING2 A INNER JOIN P_DOC_MAPPING C ON A.MAPPING_ID = C.ID_ LEFT JOIN P_FIELD_COLUMN_CONF D ON A.CLOUMN_ID = D.ID_ AND D.IS_DELETED = 0 LEFT JOIN P_FIELD_COLUMN_CONF E ON C.CLOUMN_ID = E.ID_ AND E.IS_DELETED = 0 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 'X' FROM P_DOC_MAPPING B WHERE A.MAPPING_ID = B.ID_ AND B.DOC_ID = #{id} AND B.IS_FEILD='1' AND B.XPATH LIKE '/ClinicalDocument/structuredBody%')
SELECT T.ID_ AS tableId, T.TABLE_NAME AS tableName FROM P_FIELD_TABLE_CONF T WHERE T.ID_ IN ( ${id} ) AND T.IS_DELETED = 0
SELECT T.FIELD_TYPE AS fieldType, T.FIELD_VALUE AS fieldValue FROM P_FIELD_CONF T WHERE T.ID_ = #{fieldId} AND T.IS_DELETED = 0
SELECT T.DICT_NAME AS dictName FROM P_DICTIONARY T WHERE T.DICTTYPE_ID = #{fieldValue} AND T.DICT_CODE = #{code} AND T.IS_DELETED = 0
SELECT T.TABLE_NAME AS dictName FROM P_MASTER_DATA T WHERE T.ID_ = #{fieldValue}
SELECT MD_NAME AS dictName FROM ${tableName} WHERE MD_CODE = #{code}
SELECT T.TABLE_NAME AS dictName FROM P_FIELD_TABLE_CONF T WHERE T.ID_ = #{tableId} AND T.IS_DELETED = 0
SELECT T.ID_ AS dictCode,T.COLUMN_NAME AS dictName FROM P_FIELD_COLUMN_CONF T WHERE T.IS_KEY = '1' AND T.TABLE_ID = #{tableId}
